name: Chess (itch) (ticheese)
description:
Update 1:

So far there is only the basic movement, capturing and promoting a pawn to a queen.

To be added:

  • Castling
  • En passant
  • Better UI
  • Sounds and move animations
  • PGN and FEN imports
  • Game libraries
  • Custom pieces and tiles
  • A chess engine (I do not know if I am going to try to make my own or add a free one)
